lyrics:
2 contributorsrestless lyricsverse 1
im a leaf on the river
fallen from the tall oak tree
drifting down this moving stream
wherever this life carries me
im a tumbleweed
in the desert wind
just tumblin while
the suns shinin
i have no boundaries
call me a gypsy

chorus
im restless
just ramblin
what do you do where do you go
when nowhere feels like home
im restless

verse 3
am i an angel fallen from heavens grace
oh it feels like that some days and i cant find my place
i guess god just made some of us
to live and die by highway dust
guess i just have to trust
on the days im crawlin
this is my callin
see sara evans liveget tickets as low as 99you might also likechorus

outro
oh to hold somebody close that cares
oh to finally find some roots somewhere
i know someday ill find that its out there
but until then ill just keep movin
what do you do where do you go
when nowhere feels like home
im restlessembed
